titleStmt.title: Literary work, Pharaonic BCE x-ix [GJ]Pharaonic BCE xi-x [?]

msContents.summary: The (Egyptian) Book of the Dead 17 (Budge 50:1 up-52:1, 54:5-55:9, 57:5-63:7; Naville 1: pls. 23-25, cols. 1-6, 19-26, 35-71)

msItem.note: Another fragment of this manuscript may be in the Louvre Museum, Paris (Dev√ária 1872: 75 [no. III.33])
